themes: proportional allocation based on budget and merit
key_phrases: attached to budget size, artistic merit and production capacity/experience
damaging and arbitrary to give a small org a lot of money one year, than reduce it or eliminate it entirely the next year
consistent, proportional public funding is key to building a sustainable organization or program
barriers_identified: inability to plan due to unpredictable funding
solutions_proposed: attach funding to budget size, artistic merit, and production capacity/experience
